$tweet_trend.summary: The latest trending topics on X (Twitter) in the United States can be discovered through websites like 91trends.com and globaltwittertrends.com. These sites provide real-time updates on trending hashtags and topics, with algorithms identifying significant increases in topic popularity.

$trend_meaning.value: [{"title": "What Does it Mean to Trend on Twitter? - It Still Works", "url": "https://itstillworks.com/mean-trend-twitter-13293.html", "content": "Twitter's trending algorithm identifies these popular topics by detecting when words or phrases are being frequently mentioned in tweets. Twitter then lists the current top 10 topics on your Twitter home page. You can click on any of the topics in the \"Trends\" list to view a feed of all the recent tweets containing the trending topic.", "score": 0.68318754, "raw_content": null}, {"title": "How Does Twitter Decide What Is Trending? - ReThink Media", "url": "https://rethinkmedia.org/blog/how-does-twitter-decide-what-trending/", "content": "Trending hashtags on Twitter are also subject to potential misspellings, as was the case during the San Bernardino shootings. For instance, it might make more sense to choose a new hashtag, not an existing campaign hashtag, for an event or particularly timely campaign you would like to get trending (like a Twitterstorm). This is because it would be a new, concentrated spike in use of that hashtag, which would indicate to Facebook and Twitter that this is something that should trend. If it’s a longer-term, less time-sensitive campaign, it might make sense to use a hashtag that works for a longer period of time, knowing it might be less likely to trend. What they did do, however, was bring even more volume to the #BetterPolitics hashtag at that time, helping it to trend.", "score": 0.4186262, "raw_content": null}, {"title": "Twitter Trending Topics: How to Use Them Effectively - Sprout Social", "url": "https://sproutsocial.com/insights/twitter-trending-topics/", "content": "Twitter Trending Topics: How to Use Them Effectively | Sprout Social Strategy Trends Analytics Listening Engagement Community Management Customer Care Commerce Scheduling Advertising Employee Advocacy Influencers Team Collaboration All Social Media Let’s explore how trending topics work, how to personalize them, and ways you can leverage them as part of your social media marketing campaigns. How to find trending topics on Twitter Sprout Social also lets you set up more complex queries that can help you track trending topics on Twitter. Using Twitter trending topics as a starting point, social listening can help you hone in on the most important news, conversations and influential accounts that are active at a given moment.", "score": 0.37930995, "raw_content": null}]
$trend_meaning.summary: Twitter's trending algorithm identifies popular topics by detecting frequently mentioned words or phrases in tweets, listing the top 10 on your home page. Misspellings can affect trending hashtags. New, concentrated hashtag spikes indicate to social media platforms that something should trend. Social listening can help refine trending topics, identifying important news and influential accounts.
